messages.subject: I'm off
messages.msgSnippet: I ve changed my mail to digest, so I m not so overwhelmed when I get home. I ve packed the car. Left the housesitters all the animal care info. I decorated  my
messages.messageBody:
I've changed my mail to digest, so I'm not so overwhelmed when I get home.
I've packed the car. Left the housesitters all the animal care info. I
decorated my car! <G>

We leave tomorrow early for the conference. We're going to stop in Hershey,
PA tomorrow night and play at Hershey Park, then visit a friend in NY for a
few days before we check into the Peabody Marriot for the.....

........drumroll......

LIVE AND LEARN UNSCHOOLING CONFERENCE in PEABODY, MA AUGUST 27-29!

My last plug. This year.

See you all there! <g>

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
